item.title: Miramax Forges Partnership With Doha Film Institute to Support Arabic Scripted Content

item.title: ‘Scary Movie’ Reboot: Anna Faris, Regina Hall Reteam With Wayans Brothers for 2026 Release
item.description: Marlon Wayans, Shawn Wayans and Keenen Ivory Wayans, who created the parody franchise that launched with the first movie in 2000, wrote the script for the new film.
